__comment.loop-delay: delay between each running loop of the whole workflows, unit: s
__comment.checkup-delay: check up interval for waitFroConditon, unit: ms
__comment.chrome-path: executable chrome path, empty string or unset means to find chrome in regular installed folders
__comment.user-data-dir: arg to --user-data-dir for chrome, empty string or unset means use the default one, refer chrome://version for detials
__comment.profile: arg to --profile-directory for chrome, empty string or unset means use the default one, refer chrome://version for detials
__comment.profilerTool: choose which profile tool to use, can be one of 'SEP', 'VTUNE', 'ETL', 'TRACE' or 'none'
__comment.proxy: ip:port of the proxy server, only valid when 'use-proxy' is set as true
